title: KHR_character_skeleton_mapping glTF Document Extension
description: glTF extension that provides a mechanism to map a skeleton rig to a reference rig for retargeting and compatibility.

skeletalRigMappings.description: Dictionary of target rig mappings. Each key is a target rig name, each value is a mapping dictionary.

additionalProperties.description: Joint mapping dictionary. Each key is a source joint name, each value is the target joint name.
Target joint name in the target rig vocabulary.
